data.eml:eml: Chinja, a new genus of spider from the Eastern Arc Mountains of Tanzania (Araneae, Zoropsidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Polotow, Daniele, Griswold, Charles (2018): Chinja, a new genus of spider from the Eastern Arc Mountains of Tanzania (Araneae, Zoropsidae). Zootaxa 4472 (3): 545-562, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4472.3.7
